mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Panimore, John A.

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Panimore, John A. Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Convalescent from other hospital (Aphonia). Result: Furloughed 1865/04. Reported to mustering officer at Indianapolis 1865/05/24.
